title: Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader?
notes:
Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Some tinkering required**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**. 
Needs Microsoft C++ Runtime (installed automatically in Junk Store 2.0).
description: The Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader? Plug-and-Play game is is based off the game show of the same name. It was released in 2006 by Jakks Pacific.
